item.title: Syncthing
item.description: Syncthing Mac Install from HomeBrew brew install syncthing Once Syncthing has been installed, run the following command to install it as a service and run automatically. brew services start syncthing In a web browser, type the following address to access the Syncthing Web GUI: 127.0.0.1:8384
